name: Falling Golden Ball
description:
Falling is endless runner game. It's much harder than how it looks. My best score is 217. Show me what you got. I'm trying to make it more realistic and harder. if i collect more than 25$ donation it will be on playstore with character and level selection. Of course there will be your name in the credits menu. And leave a comment how far did you go.  

Key:

A = Move to the left

D = Move to the right

Space = start and retry
